programme.title: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Justiceiro Implacável, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: No Arkansas um veterano xerife, Rooster Cogburn, tem o distintivo cassado, pois o juiz Parker entendeu que ele se excedeu no cumprimento do dever e provocou várias mortes.

programme.title: Rio Vermelho, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Thomas Dunson é dono de um império, um verdadeiro rei do gado. Junto com seu filho adotivo Matthew Garth ele inicia uma longa viagem com parte de seu rebanho, indo do Texas ao Missouri.

programme.title: A Morte Anda a Cavalo, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Bill Meceita testemunha o assassinato de sua família quando criança e cresce com desejo de vingança. Ele se une a Ryan, um pistoleiro, e saem à procura do bandido Walcot, mas ele logo descobre que Ryan esconde um segredo sobre o seu passado.

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: Keoma, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Ao final da Guerra Civil Americana, um pistoleiro mestiço, cansado de fazer da morte um meio de vida, retorna para aquilo que um dia costumava ser seu lar.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Projeto Pé Grande, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: Um grupo de cineastas amadores decide embarcar em uma jornada nas florestas da Geórgia à procura do misterioso Pé Grande.

programme.title: Por amor ou por dinheiro, (2019, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um romance de conto de fadas toma um rumo inesperado quando Mark descobre que sua bela noiva, Connie, está planejando roubá-lo. Para não ser tolo, Mark embarca em uma missão para ver até onde Connie irá roubar seu dinheiro.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Zombies)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econômico na Croácia, o mundo mudou e agora a água é rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles terão que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Maria Sangrenta, (2021, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos se reunindo logo descobre a maldição mortal de - The Bloody Mary.

programme.title: Fada Dos Dentes, (2019, Monsters)
programme.desc: O conto de uma fada dos dentes mortal ganha vida e começa a aterrorizar uma pequena comunidade.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Mar Negro, (2013, Monsters)
programme.desc: Uma estranha contaminação atinge uma pequena vila de pescadores. Quando peixes e crustáceos se transformam em horrendas criaturas transmissoras de morte e destruição.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hilarious, accidentally brilliant Inspector Clouseau once again takes on his archenemy, the insane Dreyfus, as he plots to control the world.

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Dreyfus (Herbert Lom) is finally driven mad by Inspector Clouseau's (Peter Sellers) incompetence and commandeers a doomsday device along with a demand for Clouseau’s death. Are 26 hired assassins a match for Clouseau's dumb luck?

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen invades the spirit of Tolstoy in this hilarious spoof of 18th Century Russia, when Napoleon is preoccupied with perfecting his pastry and before Wellington markets his beef.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: In an effort to save Usopp’s village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders’ path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami manages to rescue Zoro’s missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!

programme.title: Usopp’s friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates’ efforts to save her with a ship to call their own – the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the world’s greatest swordsman – but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merry’s found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merry’s been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the action’s not dead in the water – Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Krieg’s pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things aren’t looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponent’s weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami – who’s on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Nami’s loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing’s for sure – no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Nami’s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami’s treasure, but who’s he working for? More importantly, who’s Nami working for, and what’s she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: The Straw Hats’ faith in Nami is restored, and now it’s time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlong’s fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami – and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Nami’s former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. He’s so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth… and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: An Eye For An Eye, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter teams up with a younger one, to track down and kill the wanted gang leader who murdered his wife and little boy.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: The Night Listener, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a radio show host develops a telephone relationship with a young listener and his adoptive mother, questions arise about the boy's identity. The host sets off on a harrowing journey to discover the truth in this riveting psychological thriller.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Trapped, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: The Jennings fight for their daughter's life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a África do Sul com sua família para administrar uma fazenda de leões e desenvolve um vínculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leão branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura épica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Mistério da Fé
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios após adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: O Diário de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual.

programme.title: Um Chamado Especial

programme.desc: Quando Mats encontra um par de calças que contém uma quantidade ilimitada de dinheiro no bolso a vida

programme.title: Pudsey: Este Cão é Um Herói
programme.desc: Pudsey é um cachorro de rua de Londres, ele encontra Molly, George e Tommy, e descobre um plano secreto.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Meus Vizinhos Alienígenas
programme.desc: Quando um astronauta mundialmente famoso volta para casa após sua última missão, ele traz uma lembrança única para sua esposa e dois filhos: um pedaço de um asteróide que caiu em sua estação espacial.

programme.title: A Última Peça
programme.desc: Paula Stephânia organiza uma festa surpresa para o irmão e, quando está terminando de decorar a casa com muitos dinossauros, descobre que faltava uma peça em um dos brinquedos. Para recuperá-lo, Paula terá que enfrentar o malvado dono de uma loja de brinquedos, vivendo um dia de grandes desafios e aventuras. Será que ela conseguirá terminar a decoração a tempo?

programme.title: Zumbiologia - Aproveite essa Noite
programme.desc: Lung (Michael Ning) e Chi-Yeung (Louis Cheung) são dois jovens melhores amigos que vivem a vida de maneira irresponsável e despreocupada. Quando um estranho monstro surge na cidade e começa a transformar as pessoas em zumbis, eles decidem se tornar heróis e embarcam em uma jornada para salvar a Terra.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: A Maldição da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma área rural com seu filho recém-nascido. Eles logo começam a receber avisos sobre espíritos malignos na região, mas a jovem família prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Você
programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, após uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doença.

programme.title: Ouija Exorcismo
programme.desc: Em 1985, um exorcista famoso prendeu um demônio horrível dentro de um tabuleiro Ouija. Pensando que o tabuleiro era um jogo, seu filho jogou sem obedecer às regras e soltou o demônio.

programme.title: Siembamba: A Canção Do Mal
programme.desc: O choro incessante do seu bebê, sentimentos crescentes de culpa e paranoia levam Chloe a uma depressão sombria. Desorientada, ela visita o psicólogo, Dr. Timothy Reed, que diagnostica seus pensamentos e sentimentos como depressão pós-parto. O mundo ao seu redor implode e fica claro que ela e seu filho estão em perigo iminente. Mas de quê?

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: Um grande tubarão branco persegue incansavelmente três praticantes de caiaque em uma ilha remota. Enquanto esperam pela chegada de ajuda, a maré começa a subir, forçando-os a voltar para as águas mortais. Agora a corrida começou enquanto o tubarão ameaça abatê-los no caminho de volta ao continente.

programme.title: Em Campo Minado
programme.desc: Em setembro de 2006 no Afeganistão, três jovens soldados britânicos são enviados para dispersar um bloqueio Talibã, mas ao passarem pelo leito de um rio, um dos patrulheiros pisa em uma mina, deixada pela ocupação russa 25 anos atrás. Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforço chega, eles descobrem que estão cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.title: Assassinos Anônimos
programme.desc: A tensão está insuportável dentro do Assassinos Anônimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos estão tentando descobrir qual deles está por trás de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: Una extraña coincidencia hace que dos bandas atraquen el mismo banco a la misma hora. Un peculiar cliente (Patrick Dempsey) y una resuelta cajera (Ashley Judd) pondrán en juego su ingenio y su valor para intentar frustrar el golpe.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz é um serial killer londrino que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia durão, intransigente e politicamente incorreto, têm a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistanês se vê em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de reféns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista luta para pagar uma dívida. Ele assume um trabalho com um passageiro louco e perigoso.
